suggest.ext-curl: We will use `file_get_contents()` if `ext-curl` is not installed. It will be more efficient when `curl_*()` functions are available.
suggest.ext-dom: Required because `mecha-cms/x.markdown` is part of the core extension and it contains `erusev/parsedown-extra` that requires `ext-dom` to work properly.
suggest.ext-gd: Required if you are interested in installing the `mecha-cms/x.image` extension.
suggest.ext-mbstring: It would be great if `ext-mbstring` is installed. We will use another way if `ext-mbstring` is not available.
